info.title: Dictionaries API
info.description:
API to access the buildingSMART Data Dictionary.

For manually uploading import files, please go to bSDD Management portal. Version history can be found at Version history.

Keep an eye on (planned) updates: bSDD tech updates

For client developers

If you're creating a desktop client that only calls the not secured APIs, you're ready to go.
If you don't use the secured APIs but want to call the other APIs from your website or SPA, then we need the URL of your website to allow CORS.

If you are going to build a client that is going to use secured APIs, you must request a Client ID. You can do so by sending us an email and give:

  • the name of the client application
  • type of application:
    • Web application
    • Single-page application
    • iOS / macOS, Object-C, Swift, Xamarin
    • Adroid - Java, Kotlin, Xamarin
    • Mobile/desktop
  • which development language are you using? (sometimes the redirectUri to be configured depends on the used library)
  • if it is a website or SPA, specify the return url (the login page will redirect to this url after user has logged in)

get.summary: Get class details

parameters.name: Uri
parameters.description: URI of the class, e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/bs-agri/fruitvegs/1.1/class/apple

parameters.name: IncludeClassProperties
parameters.description: Use this option to include properties of the class. By default, it is set to false

parameters.name: IncludeChildClassReferences
parameters.description: Use this option to include references to child classes. By default, it is set to false

parameters.name: IncludeClassRelations
parameters.description: Use this option to include loading relations of the class. By default, it is set to false

parameters.name: IncludeReverseRelations
parameters.description: Use this option to include loading reverse relations of the class, i.e. classes having a relation with this class. By default, it is set to false

parameters.name: ReverseRelationDictionaryUris
parameters.description: When including reverse relations, you can specify which dictionaries to include. By default, all dictionaries are included

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Specify language (case sensitive). For those items the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the dictionary

get.summary: Get class relations or reverse relations (paginated)

parameters.name: ClassUri
parameters.description: URI of the class, e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/bs-agri/fruitvegs/1.1/class/apple

parameters.name: GetReverseRelations
parameters.description: Get either the forward or the reverse relations

parameters.name: SearchText
parameters.description:
Optional: Search text to filter the relations.
Search is done in the class name only.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset of the first item to be returned. Default is 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit number of items to be returned. The default and maximum number of items returned is 1000. When Offset is specified, then the default limit is 100.

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Specify language (case sensitive). For those items the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the dictionary

get.summary: Get class properties (paginated)

parameters.name: ClassUri
parameters.description: URI of the class, e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/bs-agri/fruitvegs/1.1/class/apple

parameters.name: PropertySet
parameters.description: Optional: Property set to filter the properties

parameters.name: PropertyCode
parameters.description: Optional: Property code to filter the properties

parameters.name: SearchText
parameters.description:
Optional: Search text to filter the properties.
Search is done in the property name, property description and property code.
Cannot be used together with PropertySet or PropertyCode.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset of the first item to be returned. Default is 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit number of items to be returned. The default and maximum number of items returned is 1000. When Offset is specified, then the default limit is 100.

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Specify language (case sensitive). For those items the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the dictionary

get.summary: Get list of available Dictionaries with optional filtering.

parameters.name: Uri
parameters.description:
Optional parameter to filter by first part of URI. Use this one to get details of just one dictionary version
or, if you leave out the version number at the end, get all the versions of a dictionary.
Example: https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/bs-agri/fruitvegs/

parameters.name: IncludeTestDictionaries
parameters.description:
Should test dictionaries be included in the result? By default it is set to false.
This option is ignored if you specify a URI.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset of the first item to be returned. Default is 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit number of items to be returned. The default and maximum number of items returned is 1000. When Offset is specified, then the default limit is 100.

get.summary: Get Dictionary with its properties

parameters.name: Uri
parameters.description: The URI of the dictionary. The option "latest" is supported, e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/bs-agri/fruitvegs/latest

parameters.name: SearchText
parameters.description: Optional filter text.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset of the first item to be returned. Default is 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit number of items to be returned. The default and maximum number of items returned is 1000. When Offset is specified, then the default limit is 100.

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Specify language (case sensitive). For those items the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the dictionary

get.summary: Get Dictionary with (tree of) classes

parameters.name: Uri
parameters.description: The URI of the dictionary. The option "latest" is supported, e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/bs-agri/fruitvegs/latest

parameters.name: UseNestedClasses
parameters.description:
Set to true to get classes in a nested structure.
You can't use this option if you are using pagination.

parameters.name: ClassType
parameters.description: Optional filter on class type. Possible values are "Class", "GroupOfProperties", "AlternativeUse" and "Material".

parameters.name: SearchText
parameters.description:
Optional filter text.
Ignored when UseNestedClasses = true

parameters.name: RelatedIfcEntity
parameters.description:
Optional filter on related IFC entity. It accepts an IFC entity code (e.g. IfcWall) or uri (e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/buildingsmart/ifc/4.3/class/IfcWall).
When a code is supplied, finding matching classes ignores the IFC version.
Ignored when UseNestedClasses = true

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset of the first item to be returned. Default is 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit number of items to be returned. The default and maximum number of items returned is 1000. When Offset is specified, then the default limit is 100.

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Specify language (case sensitive). For those items the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the dictionary

post.summary:
Download a file with an export of a dictionary in format supported by Sketchup.
This API replaces /api/RequestExportFile/preview

parameters.name: DictionaryUri
parameters.description: The uri of the dictionary to be downloaded, including version number, e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/bs-agri/fruitvegs/1.1. You can replace the version number by "latest" to automatically get the latest (active) version of the dictionary

post.summary:
Upload a bSDD import model json file, see https://github.com/buildingSMART/bSDD/tree/master/Model/Import%20Model for more information.
Validation will be done asynchronously for large files (>= 15 MB). Validation results will be sent by e-mail.

OrganizationCode.description:
Code of the organization owning the dictionary.
If you do not know the code, contact us (see e-mail address on top of this page)

FormFile.description: The bsdd import file in json format

ValidateOnly.description:
Set to true if you only want to validate the file. Even when there are no validation errors the file wil not be imported.
The validation result will not be send via e-mail.

IsTest.description:
Set to true if you are just testing your file. Data will be stored in the database, you can retrieve it via the API, but you can't set status to Active.
Dictionary will be deleted after 60 days of last upload.

post.summary: Upload a bSDD import model json file, see https://github.com/buildingSMART/bSDD/tree/master/Model/Import%20Model for more information

OrganizationCode.description:
Code of the organization owning the dictionary.
If you do not know the code, contact us (see e-mail address on top of this page)

FormFile.description: The bsdd import file in json format

ValidateOnly.description:
Set to true if you only want to validate the file. Even when there are no validation errors the file wil not be imported.
The validation result will not be send via e-mail.

IsTest.description:
Set to true if you are just testing your file. Data will be stored in the database, you can retrieve it via the API, but you can't set status to Active.
Dictionary will be deleted after 60 days of last upload.

put.summary: Update the status of a Dictionary

requestBody.description: The new status of the dictionary. Only transitions allowed are: Preview --> Active, Active --> Inactive and Inactive --> Active

delete.summary: Delete all versions of a dictionary

get.summary: Get list of popular Dictionaries

post.summary: Add access for e-mail domain or user

delete.summary: Delete access for e-mail domain or user

get.summary: Get Property details

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the property, e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/bs-agri/fruitvegs/1.1/prop/color

parameters.name: includeClasses
parameters.description:
Set to true to get list of classes where property is used (only classes of the same dictionary as the property).
            Maximum number of class properties returned is 2000. In the next version of the API this option probably will be removed.
            Preferred way to get the classes is by using api/Property/Classes/v1

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Specify language (case sensitive). For those items the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the dictionary

get.summary: Get property relations or reverse relations (paginated)

parameters.name: PropertyUri
parameters.description: URI of the property, e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/bs-agri/fruitvegs/1.1/prop/height

parameters.name: GetReverseRelations
parameters.description: Get either the forward or the reverse relations

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset of the first item to be returned. Default is 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit number of items to be returned. The default and maximum number of items returned is 1000. When Offset is specified, then the default limit is 100.

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Specify language (case sensitive). For those items the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the dictionary

get.summary: Get list of classes that uses the property (paginated)

parameters.name: PropertyUri
parameters.description: URI of the property, e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/bs-agri/fruitvegs/1.1/prop/height

parameters.name: InternalExternal
parameters.description: Option to get only classes of same dictionary as the property (internal, default), only classes of other dictionaries (external) or all classes (all)

parameters.name: SearchText
parameters.description: Search text to filter classes

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset of the first item to be returned. Default is 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit number of items to be returned. The default and maximum number of items returned is 1000. When Offset is specified, then the default limit is 100.

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Specify language (case sensitive). For those items the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the dictionary

get.summary: Get Property Value details

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the property value, e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/bs-agri/fruitvegs/1.1/prop/color/value/red

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Language Code

get.summary:
Search bSDD using free text, get list of Classes and/or Properties.
Pagination options for Classes and Properties are combined. If result contains 10 classes and 5 properties, TotalCount will be 15. Classes will be listed first. Use Offset=10 and Limit=5, to get the 5 properties only.
get.description: The details can be requested per Class via the Class API

parameters.name: SearchText
parameters.description: The text to search for, minimum 2 characters (case and accent insensitive)

parameters.name: TypeFilter
parameters.description: Type filter: can be "Class", "Property", "Material", "GroupOfProperties" of a semicolon separated list of these. Empty means all

parameters.name: DictionaryUris
parameters.description: List of dictionaries to filter on

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset of the first item to be returned. Default is 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit number of items to be returned. The default and maximum number of items returned is 1000. When Offset is specified, then the default limit is 100.

get.summary:
Search bSDD using free text, get list of Classes and/or Properties.
Pagination options for Classes and Properties are combined. If result contains 10 classes and 5 properties, TotalCount will be 15. Classes will be listed first. Use Offset=10 and Limit=5, to get the 5 properties only.
get.description: The details can be requested per Class via the Class API

parameters.name: SearchText
parameters.description: The text to search for, minimum 2 characters (case and accent insensitive)

parameters.name: TypeFilter
parameters.description: Type filter: must be "All", "Classes" or "Properties"

parameters.name: DictionaryUris
parameters.description: List of dictionaries to filter on

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset of the first item to be returned. Default is 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit number of items to be returned. The default and maximum number of items returned is 1000. When Offset is specified, then the default limit is 100.

get.summary:
Search the bSDD database, get list of Classes without details.
This version uses new naming and returns one Dictionary instead of a list with always one Dictionary.
This API replaces /api/SearchList.
get.description: The details can be requested per Class via the Class API

parameters.name: DictionaryUri
parameters.description: The uri of the Dictionary to filter on (required). The "latest" option is supported, e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/bs-agri/fruitvegs/latest

parameters.name: SearchText
parameters.description: The text to search for (case and accent insensitive)

parameters.name: LanguageCode
parameters.description:
The ISO language code to search in and to return the text in (case sensitive)
If no language code specified or the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the dictionary.
If a language code has been given, the search takes place in texts of that language, otherwise searches will be done in the default language of the dictionary.
If an invalid or not supported language code is given, a Bad Request will be returned.

parameters.name: RelatedIfcEntity
parameters.description: The official IFC entity name to filter on (case sensitive)

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset of the first item to be returned. Default is 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit number of items to be returned. The default and maximum number of items returned is 1000. When Offset is specified, then the default limit is 100.

get.summary: Search bSDD using free text. Get list of Classes matching the text and optional additional filters.

parameters.name: SearchText
parameters.description: The text to search for, minimum 3 characters (case and accent insensitive)

parameters.name: DictionaryUris
parameters.description:
List of dictionaries to filter on.
For a class to be found it must be part of one of the given dictionaries

parameters.name: RelatedIfcEntities
parameters.description:
List of related IFC entities to filter on.
For a class to be found it must have at least one of the given Related Ifc Entities

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Zero-based offset of the first item to be returned. Default is 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit number of items to be returned. The default and maximum number of items returned is 1000. When Offset is specified, then the default limit is 100.

get.summary: Get list of all units
Get list of all ReferenceDocuments
Get list of available Languages
Get list of all Countries
Basic check you can use to see if the bSDD API is up and running
Search the bSDD database using free text, get list of Classifications and/or Properties matching the text.

parameters.name: SearchText

parameters.name: TypeFilter
parameters.description: Type filter: must be "All", "Classifications", "Materials" or "Properties"

parameters.name: DomainNamespaceUris
parameters.description: List of domain to filter on

Secured version of the "Search List API".

parameters.name: DomainNamespaceUri

parameters.name: LanguageCode
parameters.description:
The ISO language code to search in and to return the text in (case sensitive)
If no language code specified or the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the Domain.
If a language code has been given, the search takes place in texts of that language, otherwise searches will be done in the default language of the Domain.
If an invalid or not supported language code is given, a Bad Request will be returned.

parameters.name: RelatedIfcEntity
parameters.description: The official IFC entity name to filter on (case sensitive)

get.description: The details can be requested per Classification via the Classification API

parameters.name: SearchText

parameters.name: LanguageCode
parameters.description:
The ISO language code to search in and to return the text in (case sensitive)
If no language code specified or the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the Domain.
If a language code has been given, the search takes place in texts of that language, otherwise searches will be done in the default language of the Domain.
If an invalid or not supported language code is given, a Bad Request will be returned.

parameters.name: RelatedIfcEntity
parameters.description: The official IFC entity name to filter on (case sensitive)

parameters.name: languageCode

parameters.name: languageCode

parameters.name: includeChildMaterialReferences

parameters.name: includeChildMaterialReferences

get.summary: Search the bSDD database, get list of Materials without details.
get.description:
This is a preview version! Contracts may change.
The details can be requested per Material via the Material API

parameters.name: DomainNamespaceUri
parameters.description: The namespace uri of the Domain to filter on (required)

parameters.name: SearchText
parameters.description: The text to search for materials (case and accent insensitive)

parameters.name: LanguageCode
parameters.description:
The ISO language code to search in and to return the text in (case sensitive)
If no language code specified or the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the Domain.
If a language code has been given, the search takes place in texts of that language, otherwise searches will be done in the default language of the Domain.
If an invalid or not supported language code is given, a Bad Request will be returned.

get.summary: Get list of available Domains

parameters.name: namespaceUri
parameters.description:
Optional parameter to filter by first part of namespace URI. Use this one to get details of just one domain version
            or, if you leave out the version number at the end, get all the versions of a domain.

get.summary: Get Domain with the classification and/or material tree

parameters.name: namespaceUri
parameters.description: Required parameter to select the domain.

parameters.name: useNestedClassifications
parameters.description: Set to true if you want a tree of classifications, set to false to get a flat list of classifications

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Specify language (case sensitive). For those items the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the domain

requestBody.description: The new status of the domain. Only transitions allowed are: Preview --> Active, Active --> Inactive and Inactive --> Active

get.summary: Get list of available Domains

parameters.name: namespaceUri
parameters.description:
Optional parameter to filter by first part of namespace URI. Use this one to get details of just one domain version
            or, if you leave out the version number at the end, get all the versions of a domain.

get.summary: Get Domain with the classification tree

parameters.name: namespaceUri
parameters.description: Required parameter to select the domain.

parameters.name: useNestedClassifications
parameters.description: Set to true if you want a tree of classifications, set to false to get a flat list of classifications

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Specify language (case sensitive). For those items the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the domain

get.summary: Get Classification details - please use api/Class/v1 instead

parameters.name: namespaceUri

parameters.name: includeChildClassificationReferences
parameters.description: Use this option to include references to child classifications

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Specify language (case sensitive). For those items the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the domain

get.summary: Get Classification details - please use api/Class/v1 instead

parameters.name: namespaceUri
parameters.description: Namespace URI of the classification, e.g. https://identifier.buildingsmart.org/uri/buildingsmart/ifc-4.3/class/ifcwall

parameters.name: includeChildClassificationReferences
parameters.description: Use this option to include references to child classifications

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Specify language (case sensitive). For those items the text is not available in the requested language, the text will be returned in the default language of the domain

get.summary: Search the bSDD database using free text - please use api/Class/Search/v1 instead

parameters.name: SearchText
parameters.description: The text to search for, minimum 3 characters (case and accent insensitive)

parameters.name: DomainNamespaceUris
parameters.description:
List of domains to filter on.
For a classification to be found it must be part of one of the given domains

parameters.name: RelatedIfcEntities
parameters.description:
List of related IFC entities to filter on.
For a classification to be found it must have at least one of the given Related Ifc Entities

code.description: Code used originally by the dictionary

replacedObjectCodes.description: List of codes of the replaced items

replacingObjectCodes.description: List of codes of the replacing items

status.description: Status, can be: Preview, Active or Inactive

subdivisionsOfUse.description: List of subdivisions (e.g. states) where used

referenceCode.description: Code that can be used for dictionary specific purposes

synonyms.description: List of synonyms for the class

relatedIfcEntityNames.description: List of related IFC entity names (version independent)

classProperties.description: List of the properties of this class

classRelations.description: List of relations to other classes, can be reference to classes of other dictionaries

childClassReferences.description: List of child classes (only filled if requested)

reverseClassRelations.description: List of relations of other classes to this class (only filled if requested)

hierarchy.description: List of parents of this class till root

descriptionPart.description: Description of the class, max 101 characters long

classProperties.description: List of the properties of this class

description.description:
Plain language description of the property.
If at Property level no description has been given but a "Definition" is available, then "Definition" is returned as description

definition.description:
Definition of the property.
Description is same as definition if at Property level no description has been given.

dataType.description: Format for expressing the value of the property

dimension.description:
Dimension of the physical quantity in format "L M T I  N J", for example "-2 1 0 0 0 0 0".
With
  L   Length
  M   Mass
  T   Time
  I   Electric current
     Thermodynamic Temperature
  N   Amount of substance
  J   Luminous intensity

dimensionLength.description: The Length value of the dimension

dimensionMass.description: The Mass value of the dimension

dimensionTime.description: The Time value of the dimension

dimensionElectricCurrent.description: The Electric current value of the dimension

dimensionThermodynamicTemperature.description: The Thermodynamic temperature value of the dimension

dimensionAmountOfSubstance.description: The Amount of substance value of the dimension

dimensionLuminousIntensity.description: The Luminous intensity value of the dimension

dynamicParameterPropertyCodes.description:
List of codes of the properties which are parameters of the function for a dynamic property.
Only applicable for dynamic properties (IsDynamic)

example.description: Illustrate possible use or values of the Property

isDynamic.description: True if the value of this property is dependent on other properties (as provided in DynamicParameterPropertyCodes)

isRequired.description: Indicates if this property is required for the class

isWritable.description: Indicates if the value of the property can be changed by the user

maxExclusive.description:
Maximum value of the property, exclusive
This value does not need to be the same as the MaxExclusive in the Property contract
because this value can be overruled at Class-Property level to define a more strict value.

maxInclusive.description:
Maximum value of the property, inclusive
This value does not need to be the same as the MaxInclusive in the Property contract
because this value can be overruled at Class-Property level to define a more strict value.

minExclusive.description:
Minimum value of the property, exclusive
This value does not need to be the same as the MinExclusive in the Property contract
because this value can be overruled at Class-Property level to define a more strict value.

minInclusive.description:
Minimum value of the property, inclusive
This value does not need to be the same as the MinInclusive in the Property contract
because this value can be overruled at Class-Property level to define a more strict value.

pattern.description:
An XML Schema Regular expression for the property value.
See for explanation: https://www.regular-expressions.info/xml.html.
This value does not need to be the same as the Pattern in the Property contract
because this value can be overruled at Class-Property level to define a more strict value.

allowedValues.description:
List of allowed values
This list does not need to be the same as the list of AllowedValues in the Property contract
because this list can be overruled at Class-Property level to define a more strict list.

predefinedValue.description: Predefined value: if the class can have only one value for this property, this is it

propertyCode.description: Code of the property, only applicable if property is of the same dictionary as the class.

propertyDictionaryName.description: Name of the Dictionary this property belongs to

propertyDictionaryUri.description: Uri of the Dictionary this property belongs to

propertyStatus.description: Status of the property: Preview, Active or Inactive

propertyValueKind.description: Indicates kind of value: Single, Range (2 values expected), List (multiple values expected), Complex (use in combination with "ConnectedProperties"), ComplexList

units.description: List of units to select from

qudtCodes.description: List of QUDT unit codes to select from

description.description:
Plain language description of the property.
If at Property level no description has been given but a "Definition" is available, then "Definition" is returned as description

dataType.description: Format for expressing the value of the property

dimension.description:
Dimension of the physical quantity in format "L M T I  N J", for example "-2 1 0 0 0 0 0".
With
  L   Length
  M   Mass
  T   Time
  I   Electric current
     Thermodynamic Temperature
  N   Amount of substance
  J   Luminous intensity

dimensionLength.description: The Length value of the dimension

dimensionMass.description: The Mass value of the dimension

dimensionTime.description: The Time value of the dimension

dimensionElectricCurrent.description: The Electric current value of the dimension

This value does not need to be the same as the MaxExclusive in the Property contract
because this value can be overruled at Class-Property level to define a more strict value.

example.description: Illustrate possible use or values of the Property

isDynamic.description: True if the value of this property is dependent on other properties (as provided in DynamicParameterPropertyCodes)

maxExclusive.description: Maximum value of the property, exclusive

maxInclusive.description: Maximum value of the property, inclusive

methodOfMeasurement.description: Description of the method of measurement

minExclusive.description: Minimum value of the property, exclusive

minInclusive.description: Minimum value of the property, inclusive

pattern.description:
An XML Schema Regular expression for the property value.
See for explanation: https://www.regular-expressions.info/xml.html.

propertyValueKind.description: Indicates kind of value: Single, Range (2 values expected), List (multiple values expected), Complex (use in combination with "ConnectedProperties"), ComplexList

propertyRelations.description: List of relations with other properties

qudtCodes.description: List of QUDT unit codes (if QUDT code available)

code.description: Code used originally by the dictionary

replacedObjectCodes.description: List of codes of the replaced items

replacingObjectCodes.description: List of codes of the replacing items

status.description: Status, can be: Preview, Active or Inactive

subdivisionsOfUse.description: List of subdivisions (e.g. states) where used

dataType.description: Format for expressing the value of the property: Boolean, Character, Date, Enumeration, Integer, Real, String, Time

dimension.description:
Dimension of the physical quantity in format "L M T I  N J", for example "-2 1 0 0 0 0 0".
With
  L   Length
  M   Mass
  T   Time
  I   Electric current
     Thermodynamic Temperature
  N   Amount of substance
  J   Luminous intensity

dimensionLength.description: The Length value of the dimension

dimensionMass.description: The Mass value of the dimension

dimensionTime.description: The Time value of the dimension

dimensionElectricCurrent.description: The Electric current value of the dimension

dimensionThermodynamicTemperature.description: The Thermodynamic temperature value of the dimension

dimensionAmountOfSubstance.description: The Amount of substance value of the dimension

dimensionLuminousIntensity.description: The Luminous intensity value of the dimension

dynamicParameterPropertyCodes.description:
List of codes of the properties which are parameters of the function for a dynamic property.
Only applicable for dynamic properties (IsDynamic)

example.description: Illustrate possible use or values of the Property

isDynamic.description: True if the value of this property is dependent on other properties (as provided in DynamicParameterPropertyCodes)

maxExclusive.description: Maximum value of the property, exclusive

maxInclusive.description: Maximum value of the property, inclusive

methodOfMeasurement.description: Description of the method of measurement

minExclusive.description: Minimum value of the property, exclusive

minInclusive.description: Minimum value of the property, inclusive

An XML Schema Regular expression for the property value.
See for explanation: https://www.regular-expressions.info/xml.html.

propertyValueKind.description: Indicates kind of value: Single, Range (2 values expected), List (multiple values expected), Complex (use in combination with "ConnectedProperties"), ComplexList

propertyRelations.description: List of relations with other properties

qudtCodes.description: List of QUDT unit codes (if QUDT code available)

propertyClasses.description: List of the classes this property is used in (only classes of same dictionary as the property are listed)

descriptionPart.description: Description of the class, max 101 characters long

relationType.description: The relation with the other property: e.g. HasReference, IsEqualTo

isOk.description:
Indicates if the file will be imported.
Warnings are allowed, import will continue but may lead to undesired values in the database.

errors.description:
The list of errors found.
It may happen that if you fix one error new errors will be discovered.

warnings.description:
List of warnings.
It is best to have no warnings at all to avoid inconsistent or incorrect values in the database

isValidatedAsync.description:
Indicates if the file will be validated in the background.
Large files (>= 15 MB) will be validated in the background. You receive the results by e-mail.

isOk.description:
Indicates if the file will be imported.
Warnings are allowed, import will continue but may lead to undesired values in the database.
Only applicable for small files (smaller than 15 MB).

errors.description:
The list of errors found.
It may happen that if you fix one error new errors will be discovered.

warnings.description:
List of warnings.
It is best to have no warnings at all to avoid inconsistent or incorrect values in the database

attribute.description: The attribute the message applies to
The attribute the message applies to
